refnamediv.refpurpose: Read a portion from a persistent globally shared memory

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [sim, data] = ld_read_global_memory(sim, events, index, ident_str, datatype, ElementsToRead)

para.para: index * - start-index to read the data. Starts at 1
datatype - ORTD datatype of the memory (for now only ORTD.DATATYPE_FLOAT)
ElementsToRead (integer) - number of elements to read from the memory
